Banner.Title: Sourabh Joshi
Banner.Subtitle: Software Developer
Banner.Description: I have 8 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I focus on writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular and C#, applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In 8 years of experience I've covered many roles: System Analyst, backend developer, frontend developer, and technical leader. I love contributing my knowledge to create new things that help solve problems.
My capabilities also include implementing improvements in systems, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
I also program things for my personal use, whether as a hobby or for utility.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack developer
Description: Technical talent recruitment for the company
Creation and maintenance of an Chemical Assets data Analitics tool
Programming of backend and frontend features for a web application
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: S&P Capital IQ Pro (Chemical-Insights)
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application for data consultation. Developed software for chemical forecast data refinement and visualization using Azure, GIT, AWS, ASP.Net Core API 3.0, C#, Angular 11, and SQL Server 2020. Implemented microservices for processing big data and delivering matrices and graphs to dashboards., made with Angular and backend in C#, Dotnet core. It works with Rest API and GenAI, schedules, SQS, integrations with AWS, CloudWatch, Microservices etc.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Sample Testing - Next Generation
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Created microservices for an online order placement and sample testing application using Azure, GIT, Postman, ASP.Net Core API 3.0, C#, Angular 6, and SQL Server 2017. Developed a system to manage barcodes, scheduling, and payments for customer sample testing, made with Angular and C#. It applies the chart.js graphics library

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Tax Management Services(KPMG)
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Tech Cello is available as one integrated and unified solution that can be easily plugged in to accelerate any new SaaS product development. The Tech Cello framework provides services such as provisioning, security, metering, billing, monitoring services; workflow and multi-tenant database are exposed to the application layer. This will be application development platform that allows developers to create, test and deploy applications, configurable graphs, configurable alarms, and user management. It also has reactive form logic for configuring parameters.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Coming soon page
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a two-column split page to be used as a 'Coming soon page'. Scheduled to be a fully responsive design. It has a form field to subscribe by email.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four card feature section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page that has a minimal design, listing four features on four cards. Input animations are done with angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
